Title: Innovating with AI
Title_Description: Helping small businesses thrive with modern, scalable, and AI-powered web solutions

Columns_3_description: Focused on delivering measurable results through innovative web development, helping businesses boost revenue and achieve their goals
Projects_Description: A showcase of websites I’ve designed and built — blending clean design, modern technology, and user-focused functionality to help businesses stand out and grow online.
Project_0_Description: Local picture framing shop in Scottsdale, AZ — offering custom framing, canvas stretching, shadowboxes, conservation framing, and art installation with expert craftsmanship and trusted service.
Project_1_Description: Texas-based company specializing in buying and selling homes, featuring property listings, seller inquiry tools, and resources tailored to meet the needs of both homeowners and investors.
Project_2_Description: We offer expert masonry and landscaping services with a focus on custom gabion features. From retaining walls to decorative accents, we create durable, natural solutions that enhance any outdoor space.

About_Me: I'm a tech-driven problem solver who specializes in building intuitive, scalable web solutions. With a passion for clean design and modern development practices, I help businesses bring their ideas to life online. Whether it's a custom website, an eCommerce platform, or a digital strategy, I focus on delivering results that are both functional and impactful.
About_Quote: Building with purpose, designing with passion.
About_1_description: Designing and building scalable websites and eCommerce platforms using modern frameworks and cloud infrastructure — delivering fast, secure, and intuitive user experiences.
About_2_description: Crafting cohesive brand systems through logo design, color palettes, and typography to ensure a consistent and memorable presence across websites, packaging, and online shops.
About_3_description: Helping businesses grow online through tailored digital strategies, search engine optimization, and conversion-focused techniques — optimized for both content and commerce.
